title: Pregnant Jenna Dewan goes casual as she shops for daughter Everly
text:
Halloween prep starts today for Jenna (Picture: Stefan / BACKGRID)

Jenna Dewan enjoyed a spot of retail therapy on Friday as she shopped for children’s clothes in Los Angeles.

The actress and former dancer, who has a six-year-old daughter with ex-husband Channing Tatum, recently announced that she is expecting her first child with boyfriend Steve Kazee.

And Jenna clearly had kids on the brain as she hit Ventura Boulevard in LA’s Studio City, where she was on the lookout for clothes for her daughter Everly.

Sporting a casual look in a camouflage top and khaki jacket that barely disguised her growing bump, the 38-year-old kept things comfy in white trainers and black leggings while wearing a pair of angular black sunglasses.

In kids clothing boutique Ragg Tattoo, Jenna made a beeline for the fancy dress aisle, pulling out a number pairs of jazzy leggings for her daughter.

Could this be the basis of Everly’s Halloween costume? Or does Jenna reckon she can fit into clothes made for a six-year-old? Either way, we definitely want a pair ourselves.

Jenna’s off duty look? Better than any on duty outfit we could ever put together (London Entertainment / SplashNews.com)

Browsing the boutique (Picture: MEGA)

‘Do you think they’d make this in my size?’ (Picture: MEGA)

Jenna began dating Tony Award-winning actor Steve in October 2018, following a difficult personal year for her family.

In April, the actress announced that she was splitting from husband of eight years Channing, having met in 2006 on the set of Step Up.

But while both parties have moved on romantically since the split – Magic Mike star Channing is dating Jessie J – Jenna gave her former flame a heads up about her pregnancy before the public announcement.

‘Jenna told Channing that she was pregnant and wanted to make sure he knew before she announced it,’ an insider claimed to E! News.

‘He is happy for her and was very supportive.’

Are they the friendliest exes ever?
